name: [h3h3 game]
description:
[what game]

The [h3h3 game] Prototype is a simple example platformer where you control Ethan from h3h3Productions and lead him through Mr. Wilson's Neighbourhood from Alison Gold's ABCDEFG music video. The game is stylised based on the aesthetic and limitations of the Nintendo Entertainment System, faithful to the original Super Mario Bros.

[why? game]

This prototype was completed on the 14th of June, 2016 as the end product of my high school software development course. Having finished the course, I no longer had any motivation to continue working on this project, hence why it sits in its current abandoned state.

Everything in the [h3h3 game] Prototype was created by me, Jack5. This game has an Attribution 4.0 license, meaning you can use it for commercial purposes, and are not required to uphold this license for your use of it, so long as you credit me by name. Any alteration of this license requires permission from me.

Please be aware that the music in Sender and its official soundtrack do not have the same license. You can preview the associated license when you access the soundtrack download page.
